{{Actor| | type = Armor | name = Mesh armor | class = MeshArmor | game = Hexen | doomednum = 8005 | spawnid = 68 | spawnname = T_MESHARMOR }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Armor|Armor]]→[[Classes:HexenArmor|HexenArmor]]→MeshArmor
The Mesh Armor looks like a traditional chainmail cuirass, with a leather belt and plate pauldrons. It increases a Hexen player class's Armor Class by a certain amount: * +5 for Baratus the Fighter * +2 for Parias the Cleric * +1 for Daedolon the Mage In Hexen, it is designed to be used with the [[Classes:AmuletOfWarding|Amulet of Warding]], [[Classes:FalconShield|Falcon Shield]] and [[Classes:PlatinumHelm|Platinum Helm]], but if imported in another game only one piece of [[Classes:HexenArmor|Hexen Armor]] can be used at a time. In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named ARM1A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR MeshArmor : {{Class|HexenArmor}} { +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} {{Property|Health}} 0 // Armor class {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 0 {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARMOR1" // "MESH ARMOR" States { Spawn: AR_1 A -1 Stop } } ==Related Classes== [[Classes:ArtiBoostArmor|ArtiBoostArmor]], called in-game the Dragonskin Bracers, enhance a character's Hexen Armor class.
